heading: rats!
subheading: charles m. schulz, saying that he needs to concentrate on battling colon cancer without the pressures of a daily deadline, will retire his beloved peanuts cartoon strip in february. charlie brown, lucy, linus, snoopy, and the rest will take their final bows in the sunday, 13 february editions of newspapers all over the world.
author: wired staff
text: charles m. schulz, saying that he needs to concentrate on battling colon cancer without the pressures of a daily deadline, will retire his beloved  peanuts cartoon strip in february. charlie brown, lucy, linus, snoopy, and the rest will take their final bows in the sunday, 13 february editions of newspapers all over the world.
